name: Night of the Winning Dead
description:
Night of the Winning Dead is a side scrolling puzzle platformer inspired by the classic game Lemmings. Guide your zombies from the crypt to the safe house over 6 stages using various zombie abilities. This game was made over a 96 hour period for the GMC38 Game Jam.

CONTROLS

Left-Click to select buttons

Arrow Keys or WASD to scroll larger stages (stage 6 only)

TIMER

When the timer runs out, all your zombies will die

BUTTONS

+ and - control the release rate of zombies from the crypt

>>> Makes time move faster

NUKE - Double-Click this to nuke all zombies.

ZOMBIE BUTTONS

BASHER - Makes the zombie dig in a straight line. (must have solid rock in front of him)

BLOCK - Makes the zombie stand still and block other zombies from walking past him. (You must blow him up with the BOOMER button to get him out of the way)

BOOMER - Explodes the zombie in 5 seconds. (Can punch holes in the ground, so be careful!)

JUMPER - Can grab low hanging ceilings and burrow upward in a vertical climb and emerge at the surface.

PUKER - Vomits a toxic, (but seemingly sturdy) bridge made out of bile. (Vomit also turns people into zombies.)
